title: Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 (No. 27 of 2005) (as adapted by
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Health and Social Care Professionals Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 
2005 (Special measures registration having regard to Covid-19) (No. 2) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited health social care professional act 2005 (special measure registration regard covid-19) (no 2) order

title: Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 (No. 27 of 2005) (as adapted by
Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 (No. 27 of 2005) (as adapted by
heading: 2. The 30th day of June 2022 is specified as the different date for the
text_raw:
2. The 30th day of June 2022 is specified as the different date for the 
purposes of section 98(6) of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 December, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 14th December, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [685] 3
text_norm: 2 30th day june 2022 specified different date purpose section 98(6) health social care professional act 2005 given official seal 8 december 2021 stephen donnelly minister health notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 14th december 2021 685 3

title: Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 (No. 27 of 2005) (as adapted by
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order specifies 30 June 2022 as the date on which a Section 98 registration 
still in force shall cease to have effect. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [685]
